I love my students.

content.text: Not bad! I'm a bit tired but I'm going to go for a walk in the woods to start my day off.
Oh nice! I love doing that! I always feel refreshed after a walk in the woods.
I'm really glad to hear that! I know it's not for everyone but it's really peaceful for me.
Yeah it is so relaxing. I love to listen to my music and just take in the fresh air.
That's awesome! I usually listen to podcasts or audiobooks on my walks.
Oh that's a great idea! I haven't thought of doing that.
It's definitely a good way to pass the time and learn something new.
Yeah I think I'll try that on my next walk!
Awesome! I'm sure you'll like it.
Thanks! I'm excited to try it.
No problem! I'm glad I could help.
Me too! Have a great day!
